short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple note-taking extension with favorite feature using Chrome local storage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ImpNotes browser extension is a handy tool designed to help you keep track of important notes and tasks efficiently. The extension features a sleek and user-friendly interface with the following key elements:

Add New Notes: Quickly add new notes using the input field and "Add Note" button.
Note List: View all your saved notes in a dynamic list that updates as you add or remove items.
